Parameters: View: The View which is attached to the RecyclerView
onChildViewAttachedToWindow(android.view.Description: Called when a view is attached to the RecyclerView.

Parameters: View: The View which is being detached from the RecyclerView
onChildViewDetachedFromWindow(android.vi.Description: Called when a view is detached from RecyclerView.

ClassDesc: A Listener interface that can be attached to a RecylcerView to get notified whenever a ViewHolder is attached to or detached from RecyclerView.
